sentences.en: Besides music, Viennese coffee and confection are as famous as Parisian's.
sentences.cn: 除了音乐, 维也纳的咖啡甜点和巴黎的可谓是不分上下.

sentences.en: Each Viennese porcelain plaque is intricately painted and of very high quality.
sentences.cn: 每个维也纳瓷画牌匾是错综复杂的质量非常高.

sentences.en: He also favored his Viennese diet cook.
sentences.cn: 他的维也纳厨娘也受他的恩宠.

sentences.en: I was told that the Viennese had superior taste.
sentences.cn: 我听说维也纳人欣赏水平都很高.

sentences.en: It appears that a Viennese pathologist has finally solved the case.
sentences.cn: 看来一位维也纳的病理学者终于对这一案件有了答案.

sentences.en: Many of them play in smaller groups devoted only to Viennese music.
sentences.cn: 他们中有许多人在比较小的乐团中只演奏维也纳音乐.

sentences.en: Modern ( Modern Dance ), including waltz, Viennese waltz, tango, fox trot and step step dance.
sentences.cn: 摩登舞 ( ModernDance ) 包括华尔兹 、 维也纳华尔兹 、 探戈 、 狐步和快步舞.

sentences.en: Phrenology came from the theories of the idiosyncratic Viennese physician Franz Joseph Gall ( 1758 - 1828 ).
sentences.cn: 颅相学来自维也纳的怪癖医生高尔 ( FranzJosephGall,1758-1828 ) 的理论.

sentences.en: She looked down at her Viennese fan of eagle feathers.
sentences.cn: 她的头低着,眼睛看着手中的威尼斯鹰羽扇.

sentences.en: The gourmet restaurant has its own bakery and serves smoked salmon from Scotland and Viennese pastries.
sentences.cn: 餐厅中提供自己烹制的新鲜面包,还有来自于苏格兰的烟熏鲑鱼和威尼斯的精美糕点.

sentences.en: The viennese usher in the new year with a concert of music by strauss.
sentences.cn: 维也纳人举行史特劳斯音乐会迎接新年.

sentences.en: The Viennese ushered in the New Year with a concert of music by Strauss.
sentences.cn: 维也纳人举行施特劳斯音乐会迎来了新年.

sentences.en: Things like Viennese waltz, folk songs, and country music.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢像维也纳华尔兹 、 民歌和一些乡村音乐等.

sentences.en: This great composer with his many works was the creator of the light Viennese classic music.
sentences.cn: 这位多产的伟大作曲家是轻维也纳古典音乐的创始者.

sentences.en: We Offer Unsurpassed Relaxation, Comfort And Convenience In An Atmosphere Of True Viennese Charm.
sentences.cn: 我们的气氛享有真正的维也纳魅力,为客人提供最佳的松弛 、 舒适和方便.

trans.tran_cn: 维也纳人的，维也纳文化的
维也纳人，德语维也纳方言
